item.description: I won McFadden's VIP night for this Thursday. There is a small free buffet, Drink Specials, Free entry, 9-11pm. There are a couple of winners and the one who has most guests will win $100 bar tab or a bottle of champagne, something like that. You just need to say Amy Comb's VIP party and will a wrist band and the rest,between 9-11pm. Come have fun! I will give my cell number to those who are going.
item.name: McFadden's Thursday Pre-Game Party
